content:
@article{Hutchison2016,
    author = {Hutchison, CA 3rd and Chuang, RY and Noskov, VN and Assad-Garcia, N and Deerinck, TJ and Ellisman, MH and Gill, J and Kannan, K and Karas, BJ and Ma, L and Pelletier, JF and Qi, ZQ and Richter, RA and Strychalski, EA and Sun, L and Suzuki, Y and Tsvetanova, B and Wise, KS and Smith, HO and Glass, JI and Merryman, C and Gibson, DG and Venter, JC},
    title = {Design and synthesis of a minimal bacterial genome},
    journal = {Science},
    volume = {351},
    number = {6280},
    pages = {aad6253},
    year = {2016},
    month = {03},
    doi = {10.1126/science.aad6253},
    pmid = {27013737},
    url = {https://doi.org/10.1126/science.aad6253},
    abstract = {The article discusses the design and synthesis of a minimal bacterial genome, detailing the methods and implications of creating a simplified genetic structure for bacterial life.}
}
